summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4725 for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 11 and 12, Evans & Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue West and 5th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West Howe Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54646, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
